meanings.definition: A person who operates a motor vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The motormen drove the bus carefully through the city.
meanings.sent2: The motormen are responsible for driving the train safely.
meanings.sent3: The motormen decided to have a race with their motor vehicles.
meanings.sent4: The motormen were like conductors of the roads, guiding their vehicles along the routes.
meanings.sent5: The motormen skillfully maneuvered their cars through the busy traffic.

meanings.sent1: The motormen greeted the passengers as they boarded the train.
meanings.sent2: The motormen in the subway work in shifts to ensure continuous operation.
meanings.sent3: The motormen formed a band during their break time at the station.
meanings.sent4: The motormen stood proudly next to their locomotive, ready to depart.
meanings.sent5: The motormen coordinated their schedules to avoid any delays in the service.
